revised_title: Papers Read to the Royal Society: June 21, 1900
tldr: This article presents a collection of papers read to the Royal Society on June 21, 1900. Topics discussed include the effect of temperature on metal wire elasticities, underground temperature measurements, spectroscopic examination of color, gas viscosity, thermodynamics properties of gases, energy of Rontgen and Becquerel rays, and yeast-cell plasma.
